title: Ticket #3957: Windows base config file has two entries for JAVA_CLASSPATH_SEPARATOR
description: The awk script that generates the base config file for Windows does not properly delete the UNIX entry for JAVA_CLASSPATH_SEPARATOR and actually leaves it as the second instance. This overrides the first instance that correctly defines JAVA_CLASSPATH_SEPARATOR for Windows and since the config system always uses the last defined entry, Windows users get the wrong separator character.
check_ins:
2013-Oct-14 13:02   Check-in [37837]: edit 8.0.4 version history item #3957 (By Karen Miller )
2013-Sep-30 16:31   Check-in [37731]: Fix generation of Windows config file with correct separator character for Java classpaths. Ticket #3957 (By Ziliang Guo )
